name: Publish sitemap for GSC

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main

jobs:
  deploy-sitemap:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Deploy sitemap to GitHub Pages
        uses: peaceiris/actions-gh-pages@v6
        with:
          github_token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
          publish_dir: ./  # Publica la ra√≠z del repo
